items.title: Their Dads Were on Death Row in Missouri. Here’s How They Faced Goodbyes, Executions and Grief.
items.description: One woman copes with her father’s impending execution in Missouri, while two others share their experiences of losing a parent to capital punishment.

items.title: Mississippi Prison Chief Reopens Homicide Cases Following News Investigation
items.description: Nearly 50 prison deaths will be examined, following a joint investigation by multiple Mississippi newsrooms.

items.title: How Filmmakers Uncovered the ‘Sinister Environment’ Inside Alabama Prisons
items.description: The directors of ‘The Alabama Solution’ discuss their piercing new documentary and what they hope people will take away from the film.

items.title: ‘The Alabama Solution’: A Humanitarian Crisis in Grainy Detail
items.description: A new documentary features cellphone footage exposing abuse and neglect that is all too common in U.S. prisons. Here are five takeaways.

items.title: 5 Things to Know About Robert Roberson’s Stayed Execution in Texas
items.description: The state wanted to put him to death by lethal injection. Then a court intervened.
